insights: V2 and evolved versions consistently outperformed originals through improved feasibility while maintaining innovation
Ideas with impact scores above 0.8 were heavily favored in final selection
Composability scores above 0.8 strongly correlated with selection
Evolved ideas that unified multiple concepts scored well through reduced complexity
Pure novelty without strong impact or feasibility was insufficient for selection
